mapper.select: SELECT id, title, trans_type, deposit, fee, const_type, floor, address, images, timestamp, trans_done, ( SELECT COUNT(room_id) FROM favorites WHERE room_id = id ) AS fav_count FROM rooms LIMIT #{from}, #{count}

SELECT *, ( SELECT COUNT(room_id) FROM favorites WHERE room_id = id
) AS fav_count FROM rooms WHERE id = #{room_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rooms(user_id, title, description, trans_type, fee, manage_fee, manage_tags, deposit, floor, const_floor, const_type, valid_dimen, supply_dimen, avail_date, options, elevator, parking, temp_sys, address, contact) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{title}, #{description}, #{trans_type}, #{fee}, #{manage_fee}, #{manage_tags}, #{deposit}, #{floor}, #{const_floor}, #{const_type}, #{valid_dimen}, #{supply_dimen}, #{avail_date}, #{options}, #{elevator}, #{parking}, #{temp_sys}, #{address}, #{contact})
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, description, fee, deposit, trans_type,images FROM rooms WHERE id IN (SELECT room_id FROM favorites WHERE favorites.user_id = #{user_id})
